DOC.HEADLINE: ROBERTI ' S GUN STANCE NOT A GOOD REASON FOR RECALL
DOC.TEXT: * I can think_of a lot of good reasons why the voters should retire an old political_hack like David Roberti from public office , but the fact that he wants to take machine_guns away from the populace shouldn ' t be one of them . DOUGLAS C . HAYS Glendale * Shame on the Republican_Party for endorsing this witch hunt called the Roberti Recall . In America , politicians are recalled for real reasons . SARI D . WEINER Tarzana
